question: A research consortium is studying a new vaccine for respiratory syncytial virus (RSV) in premature infants compared to the current standard of care. 1000 infants were randomized to either the new vaccine group or the standard of care group. In total, 520 receive the new vaccine and 480 receive the standard of care. Of those who receive the new vaccine, 13 contract RSV. Of those who received the standard of care, 30 contract RSV. Which of the following is the absolute risk reduction of this new vaccine?
